scripts.setup: cd magic && yarn setup && cd ../model && yarn setup && cd ../storage && yarn setup && cd ../logic && yarn setup && cd ../scheduler && yarn setup
scripts.build: cd magic && yarn build && cd ../model && yarn build && cd ../storage && yarn build && cd ../engine && yarn build && cd ../logic && yarn build && cd ../scheduler && yarn build
scripts.clean: rm -rf magic/dist && rm -rf model/dist && rm -rf storage/dist && rm -rf engine/dist && rm -rf logic/dist && rm -rf scheduler/dist
scripts.start: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "engine,logic,scheduler,magic,model,storage" -c "cyan.bold,green.bold,orange.bold,purple.bold,yellow.bold,white.bold" "cd engine && yarn start" "cd logic && yarn start" "cd scheduler && yarn start" "cd magic && yarn start" "cd model && yarn start" "cd storage && yarn start"
scripts.migrate: cd storage && yarn migrate && cd ../logic && yarn migrate
